edu.rpi.legup.history

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rpi.legup.history.History

  • public class History
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      History()
      History Constructor this holds information about changes to the board and Tree structure for undoing and redoing operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all actions from the history stack
      int getIndex()
      Gets the current index that points to the action at the top of stack
      void pushChange(ICommand command)
      Pushes a change to the history list and increments the current index.
      void redo()
      Redoes an action
      int size()
      Gets the amount of actions that have been pushed onto the stack

      Undoes an action

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • History

        public History()
        History Constructor this holds information about changes to the board and Tree structure for undoing and redoing operations. Though history is an List, it is implemented like a stack. The curIndex points to the top of the stack (where the last change was made).

    • Method Detail

      • pushChange

        public void pushChange(ICommand command)
        Pushes a change to the history list and increments the current index. If the current index does not point to the top of the stack, then at least 1 undo operation was called and that information will be lost by the next change
        Parameters:
        command - command to be pushed onto the stack

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undoes an action

      • redo

        public void redo()
        Redoes an action

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all actions from the history stack

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Gets the current index that points to the action at the top of stack
        Returns:
        index of the action on top of the stack

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the amount of actions that have been pushed onto the stack
        Returns:
        size of the history stack
